title: $:/plugins/telmiger/EditButtons
author: Thomas Elmiger
description: Save & close / Cancel & close / Save & keep open
name: EditButtons
text:
{ "tiddlers": { "$:/core/images/done-button": { "title": "$:/core/images/done-button", "created": "20170914191345424", "creator": "Thomas Elmiger", "modified": "20200604183653065", "modifier": "Thomas tooltip={{$:/language/Buttons/Cancel-Close/Hint}} aria-label={{$:/language/Buttons/Cancel-Close/Caption}} class=<>> <$action-sendmessage $message="tm-cancel-tiddler"/> <$list filter="[all[current]get[draft.of]]"> <$action-sendmessage $message="tm-close-tiddler"/> <$list filter="[prefix[yes]]"> {{$:/plugins/telmiger/EditButtons/images/cancel-close-button}} <$list filter="[prefix[yes]]"> <$text text={{$:/language/Buttons/Cancel-Close/Caption}}/> " }, "$:/plugins/telmiger/EditButtons/Buttons/save-and-close": { "title": "$:/tags/EditToolbar", "type": "text/vnd.tiddlywiki", "text": "<$fieldmangler><$button tooltip={{$:/language/Buttons/Save-Close/Hint}} aria-label={{$:/language/Buttons/Save-Close/Caption}} class=<>> <> <$list filter="[all[current]get[draft.title]]"> <$action-sendmessage $message="tm-close-tiddler"/> <$list filter="[prefix[yes]]"> {{$:/plugins/telmiger/EditButtons/images/done-close-button}} <$list filter="[prefix[yes]]"> <$text text={{$:/language/Buttons/Save-Close/Caption}}/> " }, "$:/plugins/telmiger/EditButtons/Buttons/save-open": { "title": "$:/plugins/telmiger/EditButtons/Buttons/save-open", "caption": "{{$:/plugins/telmiger/EditButtons/images/done-open-button}} {{$:/language/Buttons/Save-Open/Caption}}", "created": "20170916134122812", "creator": "Thomas Elmiger", "description": "{{$:/language/Buttons/Save-Open/Hint}}", "modified": "20200604183653236", "modifier": "Thomas Elmiger", "tags": "$:/tags/EditToolbar", "type": "text/vnd.tiddlywiki", "text": "<$fieldmangler><$button tooltip={{$:/language/Buttons/Save-Open/Hint}} aria-label={{$:/language/Buttons/Save-Open/Caption}} class=<>> <> <$list filter="[all[current]get[draft.title]]"> <$action-sendmessage $message="tm-edit-tiddler"/> <$list filter="[prefix[yes]]"> {{$:/plugins/telmiger/EditButtons/images/done-open-button}} <$list filter="[prefix[yes]]"> <$text text={{$:/language/Buttons/Save-Open/Caption}}/> " }, "$:/plugins/telmiger/EditButtons/about": { "title": "$:/plugins/telmiger/EditButtons/about", "created": "20200523215035865", "modified": "20200604183653250", "tags": "", "type": "text/vnd.tiddlywiki", "text": "The [[EditButtons|$:/plugins/telmiger/EditButtons]] plugin makes editing more efficient by adding three buttons to the edit toolbar: {{$:/plugins/telmiger/EditButtons/images/cancel-close-button}} Cancel & Close (Discard & Close) {{$:/plugins/telmiger/EditButtons/images/done-close-button}} Save & Close (Done & Close) {{$:/plugins/telmiger/EditButtons/images/done-open-button}} Save & Keep Open (Done & Reopen) Inspired by Josiah and Richard William Smith. See Discussion in the [[Google Group|https://groups.google.com/d/msg/tiddlywiki/A4v-DqjN_D8/4hkOaaf0BQAJ]]." }, "$:/plugins/telmiger/EditButtons/icon": { "title": "$:/plugins/telmiger/EditButtons/icon", "created": "20181113063926371", "modified": "20200604183653263", "tags": "", "type": "text/vnd.tiddlywiki", "text": "{{$:/plugins/telmiger/EditButtons/images/done-close-button}}" }, "$:/plugins/telmiger/EditButtons/images/cancel-close-button": { "title": "$:/plugins/telmiger/EditButtons/images/cancel-close-button", "created": "20170911161631900", "creator": "Thomas Elmiger", "modified": "20200604183653269", "modifier": "Thomas Elmiger", "tags": "$:/tags/Image", "type": "text/vnd.tiddlywiki", "text": "" }, "$:/plugins/telmiger/EditButtons/images/done-close-button": { "title": "$:/plugins/telmiger/EditButtons/images/done-close-button", "created": "20170914190201427", "creator": "Thomas Elmiger", "modified": "20200604183653282", "modifier": "Thomas Elmiger", "tags": "$:/tags/Image", "type": "text/vnd.tiddlywiki", "text": "" }, "$:/plugins/telmiger/EditButtons/images/done-open-button": { "title": "$:/plugins/telmiger/EditButtons/images/done-open-button", "created": "20170916150802062", "creator": "Thomas Elmiger", "modified": "20200604183653296", "modifier": "Thomas Elmiger", "tags": "$:/tags/Image", "type": "text/vnd.tiddlywiki", "text": "" }, "$:/plugins/telmiger/EditButtons/license": { "title": "$:/plugins/telmiger/EditButtons/license", "created": "20180104062422859", "creator": "Thomas Elmiger", "modified": "20200604183653303", "modifier": "Thomas Elmiger", "tags": "", "type": "text/vnd.tiddlywiki", "text": "`EditButtons is published under the MIT License.` !!! Copyright (c), Thomas Elmiger, https://thomas-elmiger.ch !!! IN NO EVENT SHALL THE AUTHORS OR COPYRIGHT HOLDERS BE LIABLE FOR ANY CLAIM, DAMAGES OR OTHER LIABILITY, WHETHER IN AN ACTION OF CONTRACT, TORT OR OTHERWISE, ARISING FROM, OUT OF OR IN CONNECTION WITH THE SOFTWARE OR THE USE OR OTHER DEALINGS IN THE SOFTWARE." }, "$:/plugins/telmiger/EditButtons/readme": { "title": "$:/plugins/telmiger/EditButtons/readme", "created": "20170531175031820", "creator": "Thomas Elmiger", "modified": "20200604183653315", "modifier": "Thomas Elmiger", "priority": "1", "type": "text/vnd.tiddlywiki", "text": "!! The Plugin {{$:/plugins/telmiger/EditButtons/about}} --- !!! Versions !!!! 1.0.6 * Spelling correction, thanks Mat! !!!! 1.0.5 – Inspired by Mat <:-) * toolbar configuration added to settings * revised CSS, additional icon style * renamed icons and buttons to move them into the plugin namespace !!!! 1.0.4 * settings, new styles and license added * refactoring of icons and CSS !!!! 1.0.3 * update for TW version 5.1.22 !!!! 1.0.2 * simpler button graphics (single svg) * simpler CSS (tiddler renamed) * documentation update !!!! 0.1.5 * control colours via CSS * much cleaner construction using class names ** edit-btn-icon (in variants cancel-close, save-close, save-open) ** tc-mini-icon --- !!! Plugin components * buttons ** $:/plugins/telmiger/EditButtons/Buttons/cancel-and-close ** $:/plugins/telmiger/EditButtons/Buttons/save-and-close ** $:/plugins/telmiger/EditButtons/Buttons/save-open * button graphics ** $:/plugins/telmiger/EditButtons/images/done-close-button ** $:/plugins/telmiger/EditButtons/images/cancel-close-button ** $:/plugins/telmiger/EditButtons/images/done-open-button * SVG ** $:/core/images/done-button – a slightly modified core button.
Original: <$transclude tiddler="$:/core" subtiddler="$:/core/images/done-button"/> => {{$:/core/images/done-button}} * Hints and Captions you could translate ** $:/language/Buttons/Cancel-Close/Hint ** $:/language/Buttons/Cancel-Close/Caption ** $:/language/Buttons/Save-Close/Hint ** $:/language/Buttons/Save-Close/Caption ** $:/language/Buttons/Save-Open/Hint ** $:/language/Buttons/Save-Open/Caption * CSS ** $:/plugins/telmiger/EditButtons/styles.css *** $:/plugins/telmiger/EditButtons/styles/coloured.css *** $:/plugins/telmiger/EditButtons/styles/light.css *** $:/plugins/telmiger/EditButtons/styles/standard.css" }, "$:/plugins/telmiger/EditButtons/settings/style": { "title": "$:/plugins/telmiger/EditButtons/settings/style", "created": "20200524121057004", "modified": "20200604183653336", "type": "text/vnd.tiddlywiki", "text": "$:/plugins/telmiger/EditButtons/styles/coloured.css" }, "$:/plugins/telmiger/EditButtons/settings": { "title": "$:/plugins/telmiger/EditButtons/settings", "created": "20181104092840050", "creator": "Thomas Elmiger", "modified": "20200604183653329", "modifier": "Thomas Elmiger", "tags": "", "type": "text/vnd.tiddlywiki", "text": "!! Settings !!! Design Choose an icon style here, see the result below in the Toolbar section. <$radio tiddler="$:/plugins/telmiger/EditButtons/settings/style" value="$:/plugins/telmiger/EditButtons/styles/coloured.css"> Colourful – defined in [[.../styles/coloured.css|$:/plugins/telmiger/EditButtons/styles/coloured.css]] <$radio tiddler="$:/plugins/telmiger/EditButtons/settings/style" value="$:/plugins/telmiger/EditButtons/styles/light.css"> Light colours – defined in [[.../styles/light.css|$:/plugins/telmiger/EditButtons/styles/light.css]] <$radio tiddler="$:/plugins/telmiger/EditButtons/settings/style" value="$:/plugins/telmiger/EditButtons/styles/standard-accent.css"> Standard colours with accented mini icons – defined in [[.../styles/standard-accent.css|$:/plugins/telmiger/EditButtons/styles/standard-accent.css]] <$radio tiddler="$:/plugins/telmiger/EditButtons/settings/style" value="$:/plugins/telmiger/EditButtons/styles/standard.css"> Standard colours – defined in [[.../styles/standard.css|$:/plugins/telmiger/EditButtons/styles/standard.css]] !!! Toolbar configuration {{$:/core/ui/ControlPanel/Toolbars/EditToolbar}}" }, "$:/plugins/telmiger/EditButtons/styles/coloured.css": { "title": "$:/plugins/telmiger/EditButtons/styles/coloured.css", "created": "20200524122046594", "modified": "20200604183653352", "tags": "", "type": "text/vnd.tiddlywiki", "text": "/* Colours */ .edit-btn-icon.cancel-close { color: rgba(255,0,0,0.68); } .edit-btn-icon.cancel-close:hover { color: rgb(255,0,0); } .edit-btn-icon.save-close { color: #ffbd45; } .edit-btn-icon.save-close:hover { color: darkorange; } .edit-btn-icon.save-open { color: rgba(0,200,0,0.66); } .edit-btn-icon.save-open:hover { color: rgb(0,175,0); } /* Mini Icon Colours */ .edit-btn-icon .icon-accent { fill: #000; } .edit-btn-icon .tc-mini-icon-foreground { fill: #fff; }" }, "$:/plugins/telmiger/EditButtons/styles/light.css": { "title": "$:/plugins/telmiger/EditButtons/styles/light.css", "created": "20200524124613294", "modified": "20200604183653367", "tags": "", "type": "text/vnd.tiddlywiki", "text": "/* Colours */ .edit-btn-icon.cancel-close { color: rgb(255,150,150); } .edit-btn-icon.cancel-close:hover { color: rgba(255,0,0,0.75); } .edit-btn-icon.save-close { color: #ffcc99; } .edit-btn-icon.save-close:hover { color: orange; } .edit-btn-icon.save-open { color: rgb(125,300,125); } .edit-btn-icon.save-open:hover { color: rgba(0,200,0,0.75); } /* Mini Icon Colours */ .edit-btn-icon .icon-accent { fill: <>; } .edit-btn-icon:hover .icon-accent { fill: <>; } .edit-btn-icon .tc-mini-icon-foreground { fill: <>; }" }, "$:/plugins/telmiger/EditButtons/styles/standard-accent.css": { "title": "$:/plugins/telmiger/EditButtons/styles/standard-accent.css", "created": "20200526192831788", "modified": "20200604183653413", "tags": "", "type": "text/vnd.tiddlywiki", "text": "/* Colours */ .edit-btn-icon { color: <>; } .edit-btn-icon:hover { color: <>; } /* Mini Icon Colours */ .edit-btn-icon .icon-accent { fill: #000; } .edit-btn-icon .tc-mini-icon-foreground { fill: <>; }" }, "$:/plugins/telmiger/EditButtons/styles/standard.css": { "title": "$:/plugins/telmiger/EditButtons/styles/standard.css", "created": "20200524122156466", "modified": "20200604183653420", "tags": "", "type": "text/vnd.tiddlywiki", "text": "/* Colours */ .edit-btn-icon { color: <>; } .edit-btn-icon:hover { color: <>; } /* Mini Icon Colours */ .edit-btn-icon .icon-accent { fill: <>; } .edit-btn-icon .tc-mini-icon-foreground { fill: <>; }" }, "$:/plugins/telmiger/EditButtons/styles.css": { "title": "$:/plugins/telmiger/EditButtons/styles.css", "created": "20170914192742622", "creator": "Thomas Elmiger", "modified": "20200604183653345", "modifier": "Thomas Elmiger", "tags": "$:/tags/Stylesheet", "type": "text/vnd.tiddlywiki", "text": "<$transclude tiddler={{$:/plugins/telmiger/EditButtons/settings/style}}/> " }, "$:/plugins/telmiger/EditButtons/support": { "title": "$:/plugins/telmiger/EditButtons/support", "created": "20181117205846710", "modified": "20200604183653429", "tags": "", "type": "text/vnd.tiddlywiki", "text": "{{$:/plugins/telmiger/support}}" }, "$:/plugins/telmiger/support": { "title": "$:/plugins/telmiger/support", "created": "20181103150753927", "creator": "Thomas Elmiger", "modified": "20200604183653513", "modifier": "Thomas Elmiger", "tags": "", "type": "text/vnd.tiddlywiki", "text": "!! Support the Author ''Hi!'' I’m Thomas, the author of [[tid.li/tw5/plugins.html|https://tid.li/tw5/plugins.html]]. Feedback is always welcome, as well as funding for maintenance, support and new projects :) --- !!! One Time Support If using my plugins just makes you happy, consider a one time payment via ~PayPal to reward the effort: https://www.paypal.me/telmiger --- !!! Permanent Support If my tools make you more productive or save you time in your job or your everyday life, you can support me as a Patron: https://www.patreon.com/telmiger --- !!! Thank You Substantial parts of my availabe time go to the deveopment of useful plugins for [[TiddlyWiki|https://tiddlywiki.com/]]. – Many others do the same and I would like to thank them all, especially [[Jeremy Ruston|https://tiddlywiki.com/#JeremyRuston]] and all the active members of the community! //Hereby I promise to share future revenues (if any) with other developers who’s works I use or who inspired me.// If you like my work, I would be very happy to hear from you. ''Thank you very much for your support!''
//Thomas// https://thomas-elmiger.ch" } } }
